description: Heidi is an orphan child, happy and carefree, loving and interested in everything that happens around her. Whether its the ringing of church bells, the sounds of the trees, her grandfather`s homemade cheese or fresh cheese cake - Heidi appreciates the little things of everyday life. Because she is always helpful and caring, Heidi soon wins the hearts of all. And of course she would never exchange the beloved animals and mountains against the confines of city life.
name: Heidi
